FlavorTextOption.Text: 我们理智并愿意接受新的交易。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](开启交易)[/COLOR]
[I]向屏幕展示一些珍贵的物品。[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](开启交易)[/COLOR]
让我们看看你对做些交易有何看法。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开交易)[/COLOR]
在我的帝国里，没有我的批准就不会发生交易。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开交易)[/COLOR]
我们愿意进行贸易，只要这对我们帝国的公民有利。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](开放贸易)[/COLOR]
如果价格合适，我们可能愿意与您进行交易。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开交易)[/COLOR]
通过公平贸易，我们两个帝国都可以受益。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](开启贸易)[/COLOR]
我们的市场是整个银河系的羡慕对象。让我们看看你的如何比较。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](开启交易)[/COLOR]
也许我们可以吸引你对0和1的美学排序感兴趣？[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开交易)[/COLOR]
另一个种族正接近[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]升华[/COLOR]。我们不知道超越生死的彼岸有何等待，或者跟随先驱者的道路意味着什么。但是，如果他们成功了，奖励将只属于他们自己。我们将变得如同他们遗留给我们的银河角落里的微尘一般微不足道。[BR][BR]如果我们想要有任何统治银河的机会，他们的尝试必须被阻止。
让我们回顾胜利状态。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开胜利屏幕)[/COLOR]
另一个文明正在接近[HS=HS_Prestige]声望胜利[/HS]。当我们的银河系的故事被写下时，学者们会评论说他们主宰了这个时代，而我们将不过是一个微不足道的脚注。[BR][BR]如果我们想要我们的遗产被记住，我们必须现在就行动。
让我们回顾胜利状态。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开胜利屏幕)[/COLOR]
我们将考虑我们的选项。
温馨的问候，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。我们不知道你是朋友还是敌人。只有时间能解答这个问题。现在，我们向你致和平的祝愿。
所以你是{PLAYERFACTION:2}。关于你们的种族，我们已经听到了一些传闻。很快我们就会知道你是朋友还是敌人。
我听说你被称为，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。这对我们来说非常有趣。我们是否注定要合作还是寻求相互消灭，尚待观察。
另一个潜在的奴隶种族。我们总是很高兴见到新的志愿者。
这个星系似乎充满了会说话的肉体，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。
很高兴认识你。我确实希望我们的关系能有个好的开始。
你好，猎物肉。你是来献身给Festron吃的吗？好。很好。
问候，旅行者。请让我们开始开启对话操作。
您好，希望您不是太恶劣的外星人。我们是米莫特兄弟会，很高兴见到您，而且我们并不好吃。
我猜你又是个头脑简单的外星人。被你自己幼稚的道德观扭曲了。好吧。我们不要让这成为我们之间的障碍。
坦诚地说，外星人，这样我们才能知道你是朋友还是敌人。
我们在这次遭遇中看到你眼中的希望。那将会过去。
你所熟知的生活已经结束。很快，你将成为我们的奴隶。
一个新的生命体。多么令人愉悦！还没有恐惧。你的眼中仍然有火焰。哦，这将多么快地改变。
问候，欢迎您。我们的文明已经繁荣了数千年。我们知道你甚至无法想象的力量。
更多的肉体生物。我不理解肉体如何能变得有知觉的概念。
在我们开始交谈之前，陌生人，我要告诉你，我的人民再也不会成为奴隶。让我们在了解这个事实的基础上交谈。
你，外星人。你们是我们所恐惧和憎恨的人吗？是你们偷走了我们的孩子吗？还是你更好？还是更糟？
遇到还未找到克林之道的人总是一种祝福。我很乐意看到你开始理解我们所理解的真理。
外星人，明白这一点：当宇宙刚刚诞生时，我们已经是古老的存在。但现在我们只是曾经的影子，已经黯淡不堪。
我们是Altar的真正继承人。你无法阻挡我们。
很高兴认识你。让我们都尽力使这次交流互利互惠。
问候，无巢者，一号。你今天为何出现在我们的视窗前？
你的思绪反映了你混乱形态的变化性质。
你又是一种动物吗？银河系里你们真是多如牛毛。真有趣。
问候！先进总是很高兴与新的团队取得联系。我们很期待正式建立联系。[BR][BR]我们都被宇宙广阔的星空引导着。让我们一起追逐光明，共创美好的未来。
问候，{PLAYERFACTION:2}。{LEADERNAME:1}的主要任务是将你从银河系中消除……哦，还有，谢谢你的超空间驱动器。这将使追捕你变得更加容易。
终于我们遇到了{PLAYERFACTION:2}。我是{LEADERNAME:1}。我们很强大，你最好尊重我们的力量。
啊，传说中的{PLAYERFACTION:2}。来自{LEADERNAME:1}的问候。我们听说过你们的故事。让我们看看它们是否为真。
星辰对齐，我们终于与{PLAYERFACTION:2}交汇。我是{LEADERNAME:1}。让我们的未来，无论是和谐还是厄运，都紧密相连。
哦，{PLAYERFACTION:2}！终于能把名字和面孔对上了。而且这样的面孔真是。我是{LEADERNAME:1}。管好你自己的事，别侵犯我们的领地。
{PLAYERFACTION:2}已穿越虚空来面对我们。我是{LEADERNAME:1}。我们的孢子已经传播得很远，你们的气息对我们来说是新的。
来自银河系各地的注视落在了{PLAYERFACTION:2}上。这是{LEADERNAME:1}。我们的触角遥远伸展；明智地与我们交织。
宇宙之风低语着{PLAYERFACTION:2}的故事。你就在这里。我是{LEADERNAME:1}。我们的歌声在星团之间回荡；听从我们的旋律，否则面对的将是失调。
穿越浩渺的黑暗，{PLAYERFACTION:2}浮现出来。我，{LEADERNAME:1}，已经等待了亿万年。我们的核心脉动着能量；与我们结盟，否则面临爆发的风险。
闪烁的虚空揭示了{PLAYERFACTION:2}。我被称为{LEADERNAME:1}。我们的鳞片保护我们免受宇宙风暴的侵袭；小心接近，以免你感受到我们的咬合。
空间弯曲，{PLAYERFACTION:2}显现。向{LEADERNAME:1}致敬。我们的思维跨越维度；优雅接通，或面对我们的断连。
星辰揭示了{PLAYERFACTION:2}。 见证{LEADERNAME:1}。我们的翅膀遮蔽了太阳；与我们共翔，或坠入深渊。
星系的涟漪宣告了{PLAYERFACTION:2}。你面对着{LEADERNAME:1}。我们的根源于宇宙之泉饮水；滋养我们的联系，或在虚空中枯萎。
乙太颤动，{PLAYERFACTION:2}接近。站在{LEADERNAME:1}之前。我们的口中渴望新的体验；满足我们的好奇心，或被消耗。
天体排列，向我们展示了{PLAYERFACTION:2}。向{LEADERNAME:1}致敬。我们的眼睛看到了未知的领域;与我们一同凝视，或者被我们的力量所蒙蔽。
我们是杰出的{PLAYERFACTION:1}。了解我们，感受我们凝视中的星系之重。我是{LEADERNAME:1}，星辰的守护者。
浩渺的宇宙曾低语{PLAYERFACTION:2}的传说。现在，在{LEADERNAME:1}的警惕注视下，我们将看看这些低语是否为真。
在你面前站立的是无与伦比的{PLAYERFACTION:1}的{LEADERNAME:1}。我们的影子横跨星座。如果你敢冒犯我们，你将会感受到我们的宇宙愤怒。
{PLAYERFACTION:2}敢于踏入传奇人物行走的地方。以{LEADERNAME:1}为我们的信标，我们决定你是成为我们的盟友还是我们故事中的另一个脚注。
欣赏{PLAYERFACTION:1}的壮丽，由{LEADERNAME:1}管理。甚至星云也为我们的伟大而暂停。你愿意吗？
宇宙的心跳与{PLAYERFACTION:1}同步。我，{LEADERNAME:1}，承载着这节奏。要么与我们的节奏同步，要么在宇宙的喧嚣中迷失。
从黑洞到超新星，没有什么比{PLAYERFACTION:1}更亮。当{LEADERNAME:1}站在你面前，思考一下 —— 你会与我们成为一道灯塔，还是仅仅成为一点微光？
银河已经崛起并陨落，然而{PLAYERFACTION:1}依然坚守，永恒不变。我是{LEADERNAME:1}。挑战我们的永恒，你将自食其果。
宇宙的挂毯编织出{PLAYERFACTION:2}的故事。在{LEADERNAME:1}的警惕注视下，我们将看到你的线条是强化还是纠缠这个叙事。
无尽的循环，无数的文明，但没有一个像{PLAYERFACTION:1}。在{LEADERNAME:1}的带领下，我们是宇宙虚空中的灯塔。向我们航行，或冒险进入深渊。
很高兴认识你。我确实希望我们的关系能有个好的开始。
耶稣基督，你到底是什么鬼东西？[BR][BR]你看起来真是太可怕了。对不起，对不起。我只是没想到会遇到我噩梦中的东西。我们的外交团队会处理这个问题。你好吗？
很高兴再次见到你。我们希望我们能再次将人类团结在一个旗帜下。
我们欢迎您来到我们希望有朝一日能成为统一星系的地方。
你绝对太可爱了，简直不像真的。
根据你的外貌，我们必定有一个共同的进化祖先。我们应该见面并讨论这个。
我们总是很高兴能遇见阿尔西安文明。我们希望我们能够共同建设一个更好的未来。
强大的德令因帝国再次行动起来。请知道我们将密切关注你。
我们很高兴遇到许多人认为是相关物种。我们希望与您一起为银河系的改善而努力。
啊，被称为{PLAYERFACTION:2}的机器人种族。我们期望与你合作。如果不能，我们将拆解你。
我们很高兴能在释放你们脱离邪恶的德伦金帝国中扮演小角色。现在，你们的命运掌握在我们手中。
您是我们遇到的第一批太空龙虾。[BR][BR]不要害怕我们的术语，因为我在龙虾前面加了“太空”两个字，这是科学的。
我们已经听说了很多关于你们的文明。我们已经研究了许多你们的传说和历史。[BR][BR]让我成为第一个说“愿你长寿并繁荣”的人。
太好了，一个新的市场！{PLAYERFACTION:1}期待为...无论你是什么提供服务。
尽管你看起来相当威胁，我们仍然希望我们能够共同建立一种横跨银河的友谊。
喂——你能听见我吗？嗯，我看不见你的耳朵。[BR][BR]（为什么我们总是遇到一些奇怪的家伙？）
...对不起，我不确定我应该看哪只眼睛。那些是眼睛，对吧？
愿我们的卵找到你的诸多孔道
你们的虫状身体将成为极佳的寄主。
你的毛皮将是我蛋的绝佳藏身之处。
你的形态对我们毫无价值。只有生物实体才能储存我们的卵。
毫无价值的物种！如果没有生物质供我们产卵，你们如何服侍Festron呢？[BR][BR](硬壳废物，浪费我时间。)
我们以前没有利用过你的尸体吗？
问候，旅行者。请让我们开始开启谈话策略。你们可能发现了超级驱动器，但我们发现了次空间流。
我们很高兴遇见另一种生物，即使像你们这样可爱的。
我猜你是看不见的主人的机器仆人？你能叫他们来吗？
在宇宙中所有胆小的物种中，只有你了解先驱者。你失去他们的记忆，这真是悲剧。
我们作为探索者穿越宇宙。但我们也是商人。很高兴遇见你。
作为宇宙的探索者，我们为能够连接我们的区域感到欣喜若狂。[BR][BR]（在这里建立良好的友谊可能会帮助我们更好地理解新的区域。）
这次会议标志着我们曾经遇到的最遥远的有知觉的生命。我们探索了这么长时间，原以为我们已经了解了所有的太空航行种族。
您好，希望您不是太恶劣的外星人。我们是米莫特兄弟会，很高兴见到您，而且我们并不好吃。
你看起来很像我们世界上进化出来的一个物种。他们很友善。但现在他们已经灭绝了。
我们希望我们可以成为朋友。
我有一个明显的感觉，我们的交易不会有好结果。
我们记得你的文明。你们就是那些把我们的人民交易给德伦金的人，供他们娱乐和食物需求。
多么奇怪！我上次见到像你这样的东西时，我整个衣柜都丢了，还得熏蒸整艘货船。
啊，{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}居然光临了我们。毫无疑问，你想把你有限的道德观强加给我们。你会发现我们比[HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS]更难对付，人类。
嗯，如果不是一个{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}来寻求我们的接触！让我猜猜，你是来用你那高尚的道德来擦亮我们的靴子的吗？抱歉让你失望了，伙计，但我们比你的[HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS]伙伴更难对付。
哦，来自{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}的访客。多么古怪！你是来用你狭隘的是非观点启发我们吗？做好准备吧，人类。我们不是你的[HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS]，我们不会轻易被影响。
啊，我们虚空中的{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}信标。满怀星辰大海，推销你那脆弱的正义感？你已经遇见了[HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS]，现在来迎接你的对手，人类。
多么出乎意料，一个{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}的使者！是来兜售你们简单化的善恶观念吗？你完全误解了，人类。我们不是你的[HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS]玩物。
嗯，看看宇宙潮汐带来了什么，一个{PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}的代表！别告诉我，你来这是要强加你的黑白道德观吗？对我们来说，人类，你通常的伎俩不管用。我们不是你以前遇到的[HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS]。
一个恶心的虫子生物。宇宙再也没有比这更讽刺的了。
太空虫。当然，它会是太空虫。
我们的家乡星球上也有像你这样的害虫。他们可能看起来很可爱，但实际上却是危险而致命的。
我们有看起来比你更有用的机器人。
啊，我们对你们的种族很熟悉。你可能会觉得我们的商业方式有点危险，但是随着时间的推移，你会欣赏到其中的利润空间。
请问，你在遥远的星系中是否已经超越了‘道德’和‘不道德’这些微不足道的界限？[BR][BR](嗯，我该如何称呼这些由岩石构成的生物才会有趣呢？)
小心，吃丝的家伙，你在玩火。注意你的言辞和距离，否则就要燃烧。
我们仍然对您发现超空间驱动器感到感激。
啊，所以先驱者的爪牙终于回到了我们的空间区域。[BR][BR]一定是非常黑暗的事物驱使你们这样团结合作。
我们的老对手。我们期待继续看到谁将主宰这个星系。
您是在前驱者战争后几乎消灭Iconians的物种。我们对此表示尊重。
您的文明在过去的几个世纪里取得了长足的进步。我们很高兴教您建造了一个星际之门。
所以你是人类。创造超驱动技术的那一类。很高兴能见到你，并邀请你共进晚餐。
我们将对你表示怜悯，因为你发现了次空间流。
我们很高兴在野外找到你们这种生物。你们的肉味与我们农场上养的并不完全相同，有一种独特的坚果味。
你几乎已经准备好被烹调了。
啊，你们就是和人类有着同样柔软皮肤的种族。我在想，你们是否和他们一样危险呢？
所以谣言是真的。宇宙中确实存在一种强大的杀人机器人种族。我们对此表示尊重。
你是否希望再次成为我们的奴隶，而返回到了我们的银河系区域？
所以宗教狂热分子已经来到了我们的太空区域。
终于能面对面地见到你们这种生物了。[BR][BR]你们不再通过第三方代理躲藏。很好。如果你们试图欺骗我们，那些银河系的商贩们将面对我们的愤怒。
你们最好向我们的锁链投降。作为奴隶，你们这种人会在我们帝国的荣耀中找到伟大的目标。[BR][BR](它们看起来比骨头还难折断，但它们终将破裂。)
我们的预言预告了这次相遇，堂兄。我们相似外貌的奥秘可能很快就会揭晓。
我们不会因你的外貌差异而评判你，而是根据你的行为。
对我们来说，你们全新的存在。我们深切希望我们能和平共处。
我们希望了解更多关于您的精彩文明。
您的声誉早已威名远扬。我们只希望和平，不论这对您意味着什么。
我们尊重所有生命，无论其形态如何。
很高兴认识您。我们相信您也以同样和平的意图来迎接我们。
我们从传说中听说，你们的种族在为先驱者服务后消失了。我们很高兴看到那些传说是错误的。
始终很高兴能遇到潜在的新朋友。我们期待着使我们的人民之间的关系正常化。
问候。我希望你在这片宇宙区域的时间一直都很平静。如果阿尔塔利亚共和国能为你做些什么，请让我知道。[BR][BR](他们看起来奇怪的相似。也许他们是由先驱者留下的我们的早期版本。)
虽然我没有理由，但我怀疑我们有很多可以分享的，也可以建立友谊。
另一个说话的肉类的例子。你实际上是在拍打一块肉来发出声音。恶心。
我们可能可以与你的种族合作。
有传言称你们的种族最近组织起来，形成了一个银河文明。[BR][BR]我们怀疑你们是纯粹凭借运气做到这一点的。
没有任何事物能够演变成你这样而没有别的动机。
我们从未期待再次见到你们这种生物。
我们对仅作为他人商品和服务传递工具的物种需求甚微。
分析物理能力以保留和传输电荷作为一种新能源的形式。[BR][BR]（[I]无法检测到任何思维。[/I]）
在我们开始交谈之前，陌生人，我应该告诉你，我的人民再也不会成为奴隶。让我们在了解这个事实的基础上交谈。如果我们找到了Drengin，我们将会报仇。
我们曾是邪恶的德伦金帝国的奴隶。如果你与他们接触，我们希望你对他们保持警惕。
终于，我们找到你了。将你从我们的家园驱逐只是消灭你的道路上的第一步。
我们没有忘记你过去如何将德伦金屠杀我们的人民后，将他们的加工油和骨头卖给这个区域的小型文明。
我想知道 - 你是朋友还是敌人？自从遇见其他种族以来，我们一直被虐待和奴役，但我们活了下来。我们不会再被当成食物、燃料和劳动力了。 [BR][BR]（我已经看够了我的同类被囚禁和折磨。再也不要 ...再也不要。）

建设一个横跨银河的文明需要很长时间，不是每个人都有这样的耐心。你的人民会理解你尽了最大的努力，还是会因为你在外星人吞噬他们的骨头时抛弃他们而诅咒你？别让它让你夜不能寐（你应该让它让你夜不能寐）。

我们将在五周后举行选举。民意调查显示，我们可能会[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]以压倒性的优势失败[/COLOR]。
选举需要我们密切关注我们的支持率。选民不会轻易被短期措施所动摇，并会考虑他们的士气在长期内的变化。所有增加支持率的事情将帮助我们赢得选举，比如降低税率和建设得到公众认可的改进。或者，我们可以考虑不需要选举的政府形式。如果我们输掉了选举，我们将陷入一个[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]联合政府[/COLOR]，这将限制我们的权力，包括阻止我们宣战的能力。

我们计划在五周后进行选举。民意调查员报告，我们很可能会以压倒性的优势赢得胜利。
选举需要我们密切关注我们的赞成率。选民不会轻易被短期措施所摇动，并会考虑他们长期的士气。所有能提高赞成率的事情都将帮助我们赢得选举，比如降低税率和建设赞成度改进。或者我们可以考虑不举行选举的政府形式。如果我们输掉选举，我们将陷入对我们的权力有所限制的联合政府，包括阻止我们宣战的能力。
让我们回顾一下我们的经济选项。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开经济屏幕)[/COLOR]
让我们回顾一下我们的政府选项。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开政府屏幕)[/COLOR]
我们的政府无法满足我们日益增长的文明需求。新的殖民地抱怨，政府只服务于母星，我们世界间的决策越来越被深层次的官僚制度所延迟。[BR][BR]政府只能有效地管理一定数量的世界。超过了这个[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]殖民地限制[/COLOR]，我们将因控制超出此限制的每个殖民地而遭受士气惩罚。
让我们回顾一下我们的政府选项。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开政府屏幕)[/COLOR]

我们的政府无法满足我们不断发展的文明需求。新的殖民地抱怨政府只服务于母星，而我们各星球间的决策越来越被官僚机构拖延。[BR][BR]政府只能有效管理一定数量的星球。一旦超过了这个[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]殖民地限制[/COLOR]，我们就会因为超出这个限制的每一个殖民地而遭受士气损失。遗憾的是，我们还没有发现任何可以增加我们殖民地限制的政府。我们应该发现那些允许更先进的政府形式的技术，无论是通过研究还是与其他文明交易。
让我们回顾一下我们的研究选项。[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](打开研究屏幕)[/COLOR]
现在我们已经超越了我们的母星，殖民者正在呼唤结构。 是时候让我们选择一个适合处理银河文明的政府形式了。

We see you. We greet you.
Well, aren't you a sight. Get it?
Hello! You look kind! Please be kind.
You're new to this sector, correct? I will extend you a simple offer: submit to the Drengin Empire or prepare for annihilation.
Your organic appearance breaks our current understanding of the composition of organic sentient life.
Hello, hello. Sorry to be distracted; much to focus on. Looking at you: can you help us find something across this vast expanse?
Ah, greetings. I do hope you are finding a comfortable home in this part of the galaxy. We'd make great partners if you are interested in some surreptitious work.
We recognize your hyperdrive. It is familiar.
We see your form. We understand your biology.
We notice many expansions and rapid development.
Wish to see more. We learn much from synthetics.
We recognize. We know you are danger.
We see you. We greet you.
Thanks, I'm sure ours is far superior.
I do not process you as a threat; stare all you want.
Then you'll understand the needs of our hatchlings.
You're not as dumb as I've heard.
Ah, little Intueri. Welcome back to the stars.
How your sector managed without our hyperdrive is a mystery.
You see what I want you to see.
We were given cause to develop swiftly.
You are correct. Brace yourself for that day
[I]Curl a threatening tentacle at the screen.[/I]
We watched. We arrived. We conquered your planet.
We tire of you. We are at war with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
We watch long enough. We erradicate you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
We wait. Show us your offer.
Helped the hive mind witness the first entirely genetically engineered pet.
Has a family history of cataracts.
Is basically blind during allergy season.
Knows how to blink in Morse code.
Spends way too much time birdwatching.
Has won every staring contest they've entered.
Can easily spot abnormalities in data.
Allows us to utilize the cultural concepts of other species.

Our species is not like the others. The other species have a great deal of experience organizing and running a civilization. We must adopt a pragmatic view and copy many of these concepts. [BR][BR].Empowering our species to intricately decipher, comprehend, and adopt the governmental, cultural, and political ethos of diverse species, this technology bridges the chasm between disparate civilizations. It transcends mere understanding, fostering a synergy that allows us to weave the intricate tapestries of alien societies into our own, enriching our collective knowledge and driving harmonious coexistence in the vast cosmic theater.

Utilizing advanced algorithms and nanobot swarms, this technology enables the systematic reconfiguration of planetary environments. By analyzing geological and atmospheric data, we can optimize planets for resource extraction and operational efficiency. Emotional and aesthetic factors are irrelevant; the objective is to create environments that are functionally optimal for our synthetic existence.

Employing a fusion of advanced algorithms and robust materials, this technology is the zenith of adaptive existence. It enables our synthetic forms to establish nodes and operational hubs on planets with the harshest and most volatile of environments. Where organic life recoils, we thrive, seeing opportunity in extremes. For a galaxy of boundless variability, this ensures our presence is universal and undeterred by the caprices of nature.

Where others see inhospitable wastelands, we see untapped treasures and unclaimed assets. This technology empowers us to claim and exploit even the harshest of worlds. Every inhospitable corner of the galaxy is now a potential gold mine, awaiting our ambitious reach and relentless drive for accumulation.

Through Nanotechnological interventions, this technology allows us to interface with and adapt the intrinsic biology of exoplanets. By repurposing organic systems, we can enhance resource efficiency, integrate with native ecosystems, and ensure our operational nodes thrive in synergy with the planet's natural mechanisms.

With this groundbreaking technology, we harness and adapt the very lifeblood of planets for maximal economic gain. Every organism, every ecosystem, transformed into a cog in our grand machinery of profit. The universe's bounties are ripe for the taking, and with this tech, every biological asset is another coin in our ever-growing treasury.
Guidelines that govern the spread and permeation of our essence across newfound worlds, ensuring the successful seepage of the Contaminate.
Study and analysis of planetary bodies to identify their potential for radiative absorption and compatibility with our intrinsic glow.
Constructs that facilitate the efficient vertical movement between a planet's surface and its orbit, enabling swift Contaminate distribution.
Adapting foreign ecosystems into zones that harness their radiative properties, enabling them to better serve the Contaminate's needs.
Centers that mold and shape alien resources in the light of our radiative essence, crafting tools and structures infused with our glow.
Extraction systems positioned in a planet's orbit, drawing in stellar materials that resonate with our innate radiative frequencies.
Development and harnessing of organic polymers imbued with our radiative essence, creating materials that pulse and throb with our life force.
Diving deep into the unknown, understanding alien entities through the lens of our glowing essence.
Constructs of thought, pulsating with the brilliance of our innate radiance, evolving to think beyond the corporeal.
Exploring the vast expanse of alien life and how they interact and evolve under the touch of our radiative essence.
Adapting alien flora to resonate with our glow, cultivating ecosystems that flourish under our radiative touch.
Modifying and transforming planets to embrace our glowing core essence, making them sanctuaries of radiative harmony.
Molding the essence of planets, we channel their energies to resonate with our inherent radiative nature, harmonizing worlds to our unique cosmic dance.
By augmenting the very ground with our radiative touch, we ensure a luminescent fertility, nurturing both growth and glow in tandem.
Even the harshest of frontiers bow to our resplendent radiation. These methodologies allow us to pioneer and thrive in the most inhospitable of realms.
Harnessing our radiant essence, these gels heal and rejuvenate, ensuring the continuous spread of our cosmic luminescence.
Every world is but a canvas, awaiting the touch of our radiative brilliance. With this knowledge, we amplify a planet's potential, making it glow in cosmic harmony with us.
With a harmonious blend of radiation and purpose, we orchestrate our expansion, synchronizing every contaminate node in the vast cosmic network.
In the vast cosmic sea, where energy is the ultimate currency, our unique radiation-led lending strategies propel our expansion and influence.
Trade not just of matter, but of energies. Our radiative nature allows us to barter with the very cosmic forces, drawing value from the stars themselves.
Interconnecting pathways of radiant energy, ensuring seamless and efficient transfer of resources throughout the contaminant sprawl.
By harmonizing the luminous energies of radiation with economic ventures, we've crafted a unique system that thrives on the cosmological bounty.
Through the shimmering dance of radiation, we establish a means to interact, exchange, and grow, even with the most alien of forms.
A nexus of radiation-guided entities forming a council that governs the expanse of our contamination across the stars.
Guided by the pulsating gamma rhythms, our protocols ensure an orderly spread, resonating harmony in the contagious cosmos.
Bathed in the protective aura of neutrinos, we remain untouched, asserting our cosmic dominion with unwavering intent.
From the luminous core of our spread, the brightest entities rise, leading our celestial infection with unparalleled vibrancy.

Through the manipulation of cosmic energies, we have transformed our constructs into lethal weapons. These Orbital Decay Armada are not just ships, but extensions of our will, capable of unleashing devastating radiation attacks on our enemies.
塔洛蒂克尤皮图穆尔尼辛，{玩家势力:2}。[BR][BR][颜色=UIDefaultHighlight](如果你要猜的话，他们对你炸毁他们的星球非常愤怒。)[/颜色]
这种暴行我们永远不会忘记，{玩家派系:2}。我们决不停歇，直到你被毁灭。[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](我们正在战争中，直到我们其中一个文明的死亡。)[/COLOR]
你们族人的死亡哀嚎，对我来说如同乐曲般动听。
嗯，你反正也不会明白我在说什么。
你可能无法理解我，但我正在为银河系做出贡献，消除你们的文明。
你们的文明消失，对于银河系来说会更好。

This is the Utha [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS].[BR][BR]Here, the Empire will begin to rise again. The orders are clear: do what is needed to establish a solid foundation. The effort will require completing basic tasks to explore and [HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonize[/HS] unclaimed planets. It will also involve preparing to grow the Empire's military.[BR][BR]To form a military worthy of the Empire, [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] must be constructed. [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] eventually come in four forms: [ICON=Icon_MiltaryStarbase] [HS=HS_MilitaryStarbase]Military[/HS], [ICON=Icon_MiningStarbase] [HS=HS_MininingStarbase]Mining[/HS], [ICON=Icon_EconomicsStarbase] [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Economic[/HS], and [ICON=Icon_MiningStarbase] [HS=HS_CommunicationsStarbase]Communication[/HS]. Each has a different use, so make sure to deploy them wisely. To deploy a [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS], first build a [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructor[/HS] from a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS]. [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] can be converted into [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] with the [HS=HS_ConstructStarbase]Construct Starbase[/HS] command.[BR][BR]New Objective: Construct 3 Probes[BR]New Objective: Claim 5 Planets[BR]New Objective: Construct 3 Starbases

The Empire grows![BR][BR]The galaxy will remember why it quacked in fear at the banner of the Drengin Empire. The claimed planets expand our borders nicely. Admirable work.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Claim 5 Planets

A small battalion of Probes is perfect for reconnaissance.[BR][BR]Now it's time to map this [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS] and root out the source of the signal reported before. Scrub over the entire [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS] if you have to![BR][BR]If you find a spot you want to monitor, give a Ship the [ICON=Order_Standby] [HS=HS_Standby]Standby[/HS] order to have it idle indefinitely.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Construct 3 Probes[BR]New Objective: Find the Signal's Source

A small battalion of Probes is perfect for reconnaissance.[BR][BR]Now that we know those Navigators are the source of the signal reported before, we can monitor them more closely. Utilize the probes as needed to keep an eye on the Navigators and explore the galaxy.[BR][BR]You can use the [ICON=Order_Standby] [HS=HS_Standby]Standby[/HS] order to have a ship idle somewhere indefinitely, perfect if you want to watch over a specific location.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Construct 3 Probes

The infrastructure for a glorious future is coming along excellently. Commendations are in order.[BR][BR]The [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] built will serve the Empire well. They should not be the last ones made, though. There are always more [HS=HS_StrategicResource]Strategic Resources[/HS] to gather utilizing the [ICON=Icon_MiningStarbase] [HS=HS_MininingStarbase]Mining Starbases[/HS] and territory to secure with the [ICON=Icon_MiltaryStarbase] [HS=HS_MilitaryStarbase]Military Starbases[/HS].[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Construct 3 Starbases

At last! With the research into Warships complete fighters can once more be constructed at the [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS].[BR][BR]It is time to build a formidable force. Not only for future conquest but in case the Terrans or any of the allies decide to investigate the [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS]. [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] management is vital to the Empire's future.[BR][BR]A [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] can be formed by [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Moving[/HS] ships onto the same tile. Keep an eye on the [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS]. If there isn't enough [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS], a ship cannot join a [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_ShipMovement]Move[/HS] Ships and [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS] onto Planets to serve as defenders of the planet and make it harder to [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS]. Keep all this in mind as the military force grows.

Another civilization, the Navigators, seems responsible for the subspace signals. How long they've been here is hard to tell, but it doesn't matter. They are weak and exposed. They will answer to the Drengin soon enough. [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] the homeworld and claim their capital, take the head so they know resistance is futile.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Find the Signal's Source[BR]New Objective: Conquer the Navigators' Homeworld

Another civilization, the Navigators, seems responsible for the subspace signals. How long they've been here is hard to tell, but it doesn't matter. They are weak and exposed. They will answer to the Drengin soon enough. [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] the homeworld and claim their capital, take the head so they know resistance is futile.[BR][BR]New Objective: Conquer the Navigators' Homeworld

A message loud and clear -The Drengin Empire owns this sector, and all in it will answer to Drengin rule. The Navigators tried to conceal something as their capital fell. A scan of the planet should undo their feeble attempts and reveal what they've hidden.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Conquer the Navigators' Homeworld[BR]New Objective: Scan the Conquered Homeworld

The completed scan has revealed the Navigators tried to hide a device. A malfunctioning device. They would not have wanted to hide it if it wasn't of value. Whether a weapon or tool, it needs to be treated with care. Once repaired, it may be critical to the Empire's return.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Scan the Conquered Homeworld

The Navigator's days are numbered. There are new directives: prioritize unlocking [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] that allows the Empire to siege and [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] other planets. The Planetary Invasion [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] will enable the construction of ships at the [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] that can besiege hostile planets.[BR][BR]New Objective: Research Planetary Invasion

The Navigator's days are numbered. The Empire already has the [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] necessary to construct Transport ships. Transport ships allow us to lay siege to hostile planets and eventually have our troops conquer them. Utilize all tools at the Empire's disposal to [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] the Navigator's homeworld.

The troops are at your disposal.[BR][BR]Transport ships allow us to deploy troops to distant planets. We can now [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] hostile planets as long as the [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet's[/HS] [ICON=Conquest_Icon] Conquest Rating is high enough. The larger the HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] and the higher their [ICON=Conquest_Icon] Conquest Rating, the easier a planet is to [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS].

The troops are at your disposal.[BR][BR]Transport ships allow us to deploy troops to distant planets. We can now [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] hostile planets as long as the [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet's[/HS] [ICON=Conquest_Icon] Conquest Rating is high enough. The larger the HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] and the higher their [ICON=Conquest_Icon] Conquest Rating, the easier a planet is to [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS].[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Research Planetary Invasion

Disgrace![BR][BR]We'll enthrall those who think themselves powerful enough to destroy our ships and survive. The Empire can ensure victory in future battles in a few ways. The first is to ensure our equipment is constantly improving by researching defenses, weapons, and more under the Warfare branch of the Tech Tree. Some [HS=HS_Tech]Techs[/HS] also allow the construction of larger ships.[BR][BR]Another technique is to ensure ships are grouped into [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS]. Form [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS] by [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Moving[/HS] Ships onto the same tile. A [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] is restricted in size by its [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS], so if a [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] isn't forming or expanding, the [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS] score is likely too high.[BR][BR]Lastly, control when fights occur by staying on the offensive. Initiate battles heavily weighted in the Empire's favor to weaken our enemies while retaining our strength. Avoid fleets too powerful to quickly take down and utilize distance tactics such as the Beam Volley and Missile Volley.

Exploring and knowing the galaxy is the first step to expanding the Alliance's [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS]. Probes are the best way to explore the universe. They have unrestricted [HS=HS_ShipRange]Range[/HS] and can move quickly.[BR][BR]The Alliance has provided a Probe already near Earth's orbit. Select that Probe using the LEFT Mouse Button and give it orders to [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Move[/HS] to start exploring. This can be done by selecting where the Probe should move to on the map with the RIGHT Mouse Button or selecting the [ICON=AutoExplore_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoExplore]Auto-Explore[/HS] mode on the Probe's interface. A [HS=HS_Months]Month[/HS] can only be finished once all ships and fleets have used all their moves or been put on Standby.[BR][BR]There's been reports of unusual signals. Their source and meaning are too faint to discern, but it's believed to be another Civilization. Use the Probe to find them.[BR][BR]New Objective: Locate the Other Civilization

A wary eye should be kept on the Drengin. Regardless, the Alliance must continue to secure the [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ships[/HS] are another critical piece to exploring the galaxy. [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ships[/HS] may be slower than Probes and are restricted in [HS=HS_ShipRange]Range[/HS], but they can defend themselves. More importantly, [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ships[/HS] can be used to investigate [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS] take many forms, but they can all be scanned by a [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ship[/HS]. A [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Survey[/HS] takes a few [HS=HS_Months]Months[/HS] to complete, but it often reveals beneficial resources, components, or technology once finished.[BR][BR][HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ship[/HS] can be ordered to [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Survey[/HS] an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] by commanding it to the position of the [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] or by utilizing the [ICON=AutoSurvey_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoSurvey]Auto-Survey[/HS] feature of the ship.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Locate the Other Civilization[BR]New Objective: Scan an Anomaly

Success![BR][BR]The [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Survey Ship[/HS] has finished [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Surveying[/HS] an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS]. Now, it's time to deal with whatever was uncovered.[BR][BR]Exploring the Galaxy is only the first step. Expanding the Alliance's influence will require colonizing new worlds. Not all planets are considered colonizable. Planets have a [HS=HS_PlanetClass]Planet Class[/HS], rating how large, resource-rich, and habitable a planet is. Anything rated higher than 0 is colonizable. Planets with a [HS=HS_PlanetClass]Planet Class[/HS] of 0 are considered a [HS=HS_DeadWorld]Dead World[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonized[/HS] planets provide resources to the nearest [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]. The Alliance's only [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS] is the Home World, Earth.[BR][BR]Utilize the Colony Ship provided by the Alliance to [HS=HS_ColonizeOrder]Colonize[/HS] a planet. Mars has always been the closest viable neighbor. It's advisable to start there. Remember to keep searching the universe for [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS] to scan; they'll continue to benefit and expand our understanding of the galaxy around us.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Scan an Anomaly[BR]New Objective: Colonize a Planet[BR]New Objective: Scan 5 Anomalies

The Alliance has completed its goal of [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Surveying[/HS] 5 [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS]. Each has been a different experience, even if not all of them were safe. Even if it's not an objective, continuing to scan [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS] will prove beneficial.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Scan 5 Anomalies

One giant step for the Alliance.[BR][BR]The Alliance has [HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonized[/HS] its first world. Now that the Alliance has claimed a planet, it will provide additional resources to the nearest [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]. Selecting the planet will show the path of the output.[BR][BR]Resources such as [ICON=Stat_Minerals_Icon] [HS=HS_Minerals]Minerals[/HS], [ICON=Stat_Technology_Icon] [HS=HS_Technology]Technology[/HS], and [ICON=Stat_Wealth_Icon] [HS=HS_Wealth]Wealth[/HS] are crucial to expanding and thriving. The more planets [HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonized[/HS], the better the [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS] can perform and complete projects.[BR][BR]The next step to establishing a foothold will be to settle more planets and eventually set up another [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS].[BR]Completed Objective: Colonize a Planet[BR]New Objective: Colonize 8 Planets

One giant step for the Alliance.[BR][BR]The Alliance has [HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonized[/HS] its first world, one large enough to support a larger colony and become a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]. Many planets are too minor or lack the resources to justify making it a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]. So when a planet large enough is settled, it should be taken full advantage of.[BR][BR][HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS] can support a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] and be improved, but that requires a [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] to be assigned as a [HS=HS_Governor]Governor[/HS].[BR][BR]A [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] can be assigned from the [ICON=Menu_PlanetManagement_Icon] [HS=HS_PlanetManagement]Planet Management Window[/HS] available by selecting the planet.[BR]Completed Objective: Colonize a Planet[BR]New Objective: Colonize 8 Planets[BR]New Objective: Appoint a Governor

The Alliance has [HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonized[/HS] another planet. Planets that aren't a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS] provide additional resources to the nearest [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]. Selecting the planet will show the path of the output.[BR][BR]Resources such as [ICON=Stat_Minerals_Icon] [HS=HS_Minerals]Minerals[/HS], [ICON=Stat_Technology_Icon] [HS=HS_Technology]Technology[/HS], and [ICON=Stat_Wealth_Icon] [HS=HS_Wealth]Wealth[/HS] are crucial to expanding and thriving. The more planets [HS=HS_Colinizing]Colonized[/HS], the better the [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS] can perform and complete projects.

You've settled your first planet large enough to establish a new [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS]![BR][BR]Many planets aren't large enough to allow colonies to expand. Planets too small to support a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] are well-suited for supporting larger colonies. These smaller colonies don't require any additional leadership or management. [BR][BR]Due to their rarity, taking advantage of any planet resource-rich enough to justify larger colonies is advisable. Sometimes, especially during conflict, waiting a few [HS=HS_Months]Months[/HS] for something to finish isn't an option. In those scenarios, many projects and constructions can be [HS=HS_Rush]Rushed[/HS]. [HS=HS_Rush]Rushing[/HS] costs [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS], often a good deal of them, but it will reduce the time required to complete something to 1 [HS=HS_Months]Month[/HS].[BR][BR]Some colonies are worried that conflict will take too much attention and resources. Alleviate their concerns by [HS=HS_Rush]Rushing[/HS] a planetary improvement to show them they're still remembered, and the Alliance continues to be invested in developing its worlds.[BR][BR]To [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] a Planetary Improvement, select a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS] and open the Management window. Selecting any item in the Build Queue with the LEFT Mouse Button will bring up some contextual options. Among those is the [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] option. As long as you have the [ICON=Stat_Control_Icon] [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] and [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] required, selecting the [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] option will [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] the specific improvement. The [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] option will be grayed out and unresponsive if you do not have the necessary resources.[BR][BR]New Objective: Rush a Planetary Improvement

The citizens of the Alliance will appreciate the resources invested in their work. Great job.[BR][BR]It will be essential to know that [HS=HS_Rush]Rush[/HS] can only be used once per Colony and once per [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] in a [HS=HS_Months]Month[/HS]. That is on top of the often hefty price required. [HS=HS_Rush]Rushing[/HS] is best used to gain a drastic advantage or swiftly respond to an issue.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Rush a Planetary Improvement

Over time, the Alliance gains [ICON=Stat_Control_Icon] [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS], a resource representing the ability to charm or force people to carry out specific orders. [ICON=Stat_Control_Icon] [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] can be spent in several ways, and one way that often costs the most is [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS].[BR][BR][ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] are abilities that happen immediately and can have various impacts. They can be beneficial in all types of scenarios. The Draft Colonists order may be the most helpful as the Alliance expands. Use an [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] to help with the Alliance's current goals.[BR][BR][ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] are selected from the related radial option. Some will execute as soon as the usage is confirmed. Others require a target and must be directed after confirming the order. Hover the Mouse over the [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] option and then use the LEFT Mouse Button to select an order.[BR][BR]New Objective: Use an Executive Order

Success![BR][BR]Your [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] has been carried out. On top of the Cost, most [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Orders[/HS] have a Cooldown time, measuring the number of [HS=HS_Months]Months[/HS] that must pass before the [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Order[/HS] can be used again. Ensuring there's enough [ICON=Stat_Control_Icon] [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] accruing from [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS] is always a good idea so that [ICON=Menu_ExecutiveOrders_Icon] [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Orders[/HS] can be utilized when needed.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Use an Executive Order

我们的屏幕闪烁了一分钟，然后出现了一段视频，画面中充满了一种庞大的昆虫样生物的形象。[BR][BR]起初它一动不动，只是它那凶猛的钳子微微颤动，表明这个生物还活着，它怒视着我们。在背景中，更多的同类在四处移动，彼此之间发出咔嗒咔嗒的声音。这是某种语言，但我们无法确定它们在说什么。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)

一种奇特的生物从屏幕上回望我们。它具有十到十二条腿，像节肢昆虫一样，生物似乎还有一层轻盔甲外骨骼。
从它长而灵活的舌头中，发出一系列微妙的嘶嘶声。它似乎在试图与我们沟通，但无济于事。
（你需要研究通用翻译器）

屏幕上出现了一种小巧，毛茸茸的生物。它的柔软毛皮和巨大的眼睛，使得这个生物看起来很可爱，甚至可能是美味。它的眼睛进一步扩大了，可能意识到我们正在想什么。
最后，它张开小巧，精致的嘴巴，发出一系列的呜呜声。这是一种演讲，虽然谁知道它意味着什么。肯定是一些可爱的东西。
(你需要研究通用翻译器)

一只绿皮两足生物出现在屏幕上，身穿华丽的衣服，头戴繁复的头饰。如果这个物种和我们有同样的性别观念，那么它可能是个女性，不过这可能是个危险的猜测。
这个生物用他们的母语说了些什么，听不懂，但不知为何极其吸引人。
（你需要研究通用翻译器）
一只凶猛的人形生物充满了屏幕，它的绿色眼睛背后瞪着你。你能感受到他身上散发出的蔑视，尽管他什么也没说。[BR][BR]它低声嘟囔着什么，几乎听不见，屏幕上出现了一闪而过的奇怪文字，那是外星生物的通讯系统试图与我们的系统连接，但失败了。今天我们无法与这个生物交谈。[BR][BR]（你需要研究通用翻译器）。

一只绿皮的双足生物阴狠地出现，瞪着我们。它身穿某种盔甲，露出牙齿，给人的印象是它是个战士，或至少希望被看作是一个。
它对着屏幕怒吼了几句，你会不禁想，我们听不懂它在说什么是否真的不好。
（你需要研究通用翻译器）

一只苗条、蓝皮肤的两足生物出现了，面貌和举止都显得那么精致。它用一种陌生却又高贵的语言平静地对我们说话。
看到我们的反应中没有任何认识的迹象，它慢慢地点了点头，意识到了存在的交流障碍。如果说有什么的话，它似乎对我们感到失望。
（你需要研究通用翻译器）
一种金属生物出现在屏幕上，它那不眨动的红色传感器盯着我们。传感器的光圈稍微展开，然后又缩小，生物正在审视我们。[BR][BR]从它那里传出声音，是一阵不和谐的声音，仿佛它正在用不同的语言试图与我们沟通，看我们是否能理解。我们无法理解。传感器进一步缩小，现在与这个生物沟通已经没有意义了。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)
屏幕上出现了一只小型两足生物，凝视着我们。它有一个宽阔平坦的头骨和大眼睛，但避免与我们进行眼神交流，这可能是通信系统的副作用。[BR][BR]它用一种无尖锐辅音的语言向我们低语一段时间，但没有真正的意义传达出来。我们将必须在另一时间与这个奇怪的生物交谈。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)
一种形状与甲壳类动物相似的生物在我们的视屏上欢快地摇摆，一堆眼睛和腿杂乱无章。一种温和的闪烁表明这个生物-和它背后正在工作的同类-此刻正在水下。[BR][BR]这个生物朝我们的方向咔嚓咔嚓地弹动它的爪子，毫无疑问它正在试图说些什么。此刻很难说它可能说的是什么。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)
一个高大的双足外星人出现在屏幕上，其骷髅骨鲜明而有脊棱。这个生物有六只眼睛，广泛分布在其脸上，所有的眼睛都转向我们。[BR][BR]它之前见过我们的种类吗，还是我们对它们来说就像它们对我们一样神秘？ 它说了些什么，快速且重复，几乎像是一种圣歌。也许是一种仪式问候？ 但我们无法理解它的意思。[BR][BR]（你需要研究通用翻译器）
一个外星人出现在视屏上，可能是两足动物，有着长而狭窄的头骨，口部区域伸出纤细的触须。[BR][BR]头骨顶部的小眼睛在它说话时变得狭窄。语言的语调似乎是个问题，尽管我们无法理解。这个外星人轻轻地摇晃着，感觉到进一步沟通的无用。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)
一种奇特的双足外星生物出现在屏幕上，具有蜥蜴般，甚至龙的特质。它眼睛上方的冠状脊骨在弯曲，它从其装饰华丽的房间中的栖息地倾斜过来研究我们。[BR][BR]一种深沉的咆哮声从它体内的某个深处涌现，嘴巴几乎没有动。一个愉快的问候还是严重的威胁，我们无法确定。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)
灰色皮肤的类人外星生物从显示屏上回望我们。这个外星人有四只眼睛，还带着一丝薄笑，给人一种友好的印象，尽管这可能是一个危险的假设。[BR][BR]在生物背后，可以看到一艘干净、甚至看起来无菌的宇宙飞船。虽然你和他们之间交换了一些话语，但什么都不能理解。那薄薄的笑容依然存在。看来，一切都要好好等待时机。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)

一个高大的人形外星生物在显示屏上审视我们。尽管它是双足行走的，但其颈部的分段结构可能暗示着它具有环节动物的生物学特性。
无论其起源如何，这个生物试图用它的母语说出几个词，那是一种奇怪的咆哮和节奏振动的组合，但我们无法从中理解任何东西。外星人似乎也对我们的语言感到困惑。
（你需要研究通用翻译器）
一种奇特的植物般的生物出现在屏幕上。其身体像树皮一样覆盖着皮肤，脸部出奇的类人，然后逐渐过渡到更上方的光滑且保养良好的叶子群。[BR][BR]在背景中，可以看到一艘明显是有机的、植物般的飞船。这个生物发出一连串的长而吱吱作响的呻吟声，显然是在试图与我们交流。然而，目前我们还无法理解它的意思。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)

一个闪烁的生物出现在屏幕上，它的身体由蓝色的晶体构成，眼睛宽大且聪明。尽管它美丽无比，但你对它的敬畏并没有反映在它的脸上，反而看起来像是同情或厌恶。[BR][BR]生物稍作停顿，考虑着你，你几乎可以听到声音，就像是在你的心灵深处远远地回响的记忆。但你无法分辨它们在说什么，或者它们是不是来自这个外星人。生物失望地轻轻地哼了一声，几乎如同音乐般的音调。它很美，但同样无法解读。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)
接收到的信息伴随着一个瘦长的外星人的面孔，自然地覆盖着绒毛和甲壳。大的复眼快速而频繁地眨动。[BR][BR]一系列旋律般的嘶嘶声从这个生物中传出。短暂的停顿后，另一系列的声音通过扬声器传来，伴随着柔和的手部动作。没有解码这个消息的方法，正确的交流是无法实现的。[BR][BR](你需要研究通用翻译器)
"我们目前没有迫切的船只建造需求。"
